name: Eddy紫 ~Eddy Violet~ Soundtrack 原声音乐专辑
detailed_description:
Here is the soundtrack for the original game "Eddy Violet"~

Music by 大谷 DGSpitzer
Vocal for the song "A Girl's Violet Dream" by my friend~ You Xiao Tuan

Including 31 pieces of music:

{01} Violet of Wandering, World of Nirvana - 飘渺之紫，涅槃之世
{02} A Girl's Violet Dream - 紫囚之梦 [Vocal. 游小团]
{03} Lost Landscape - 失却的风景
{04} Restless β Brainwaves - 不安的β脑波
{05} The Last Train to The End - 开往终途的列车
{06} Strawberry Poison - 草莓毒素
{07} The Monster Castle - 妖怪城堡
{08} First Test - 试锋
{09} King of Cavern - 洞窟之王
{10} Jazz of Dawn - 黎明爵士
{11} Strange Traveller - 怪异旅行家
{12} Orange Dawn - 橙 ~黎明~
{13} The Unique Guardian - 独一无二的卫士
{14} Swarm - 蜂群
{15} Core of Chaos - 混沌核心
{16} Expedition of Survivors - 幸存者的远征
{17} Purple Piano of Joy - 快速的紫色钢琴
{18} Nightwalk of Old Puppet - 老木偶夜行记
{19} Fragments of Childhood - 童年碎片
{20} Orphan Asylum of Shrine - 圣堂孤儿院
{21} As the Shadow Follows ~ Deep Purple ~ - 如影随形 ~深紫~
{22} The Great Mother - 母神
{23} Fade Away - 消失
{24} The Unpredictable - 云谲波诡
{25} Undercurrent - 暗流
{26} Conspirator - 谋反者
{27} Imminence of War - 临战
{28} Terminal of Conspiracy - 阴谋的终点
{29} Home, Purple Home~ - 紫宅~家~
{30} Looping ~ Order & Obey - 循环~命令与遵从
{31} ~Hope~ - 希望
{32} Legends of Vortex Guardian - 涡漩卫传奇

short_description: Here is the soundtrack for the original game "Eddy Violet"~ Including 31 pieces of original music。
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Inter(R)Celeron(R)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: SIS
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek AC’97 Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: SIS
  • Sound Card: Realtek AC’97 Audio
